articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Ya toh haar ke ayenge…': India U19 lad slips up in motivating Hardik-like knock - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Naman Tiwari wanted to motivate Murugan Abhishek for his innings but the words came out wrong as India U19 lost to Australia U19 in the U19 World Cup final. | Cricket
articles.content: For the third time in less than a year, India lost to Australia in the final of an ICC event. After the senior men's cricket team came up short at the World Test Championship and the 50-overs World C… [+2832 chars]
